text: A Zed & Two Noughts is a 1985 British Dutch comedy-drama movie directed by Peter Greenaway and starring Andrea Ferreol, Brian Deacon, Eric Deacon, Joss Ackland, Frances Barber, Jim Davidson, Gerard Thoolen, Geoffrey Palmer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Dutch comedy movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Greenaway
title: A Zed & Two Noughts
